Set of messages 1.Message:
Memory game – “When COVID-19 ends…”
•	First person says, “When COVID-19 ends, I am going to… (e.g., go to the park)”
•	Second person adds to the first person’s plan, “When COVID-19 ends, I am going to the park and… (e.g., visit my best friend)”
•	Each person adds to the previous list of plans, trying to think of all of the fun things to do when COVID-19 ends.
